name: Block Ape Scissors
intro: P2E ecosystem providing utility to NFT's and crypto coins
introduce: Block Ape Scissors（BAS） is a P2E ecosystem providing utility to NFT's and crypto coins through a gamified metaverse. BAS will encapsulate an ‘Earniverse’, creating play to earn and game utility for various 3rd party NFTs and Tokens by a process of studying their communities, histories and project in order to develop collaborative PvE type adventures for their holders to play and win NFTs in.
